short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch videos with Picture-in-Picture and ad-free youtube videos with viettub.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Picture-in-Picture (PiP) allows you to watch videos in a floating window (always on top of other windows) so you can keep an eye on what you’re watching while interacting with other sites, or applications.

Keyboard shortcut: Alt + P (⌥ + P on macOS)

Also, you can watch ad-free youtube videos on our viettub.com platform

- Website: https://viettub.com
- Extension to watch youtube videos without ads : https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/viettube-xem-youtube-kh%C3%B4n/pcjmndlffckoehnccjgaljfjpnnojakb?hl=vi
